alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 9:04AM PST until February 03 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest in the hills today. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Interstate 5 and Highways 23, 101, 118, 170 and 405. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance that this advisory may be extended or reissued for tonight through Friday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
